data.comment: The big names in today's match at WWK ARENA have now been confirmed.
The whistle has gone to start the match.
In the minute 1, Ball safe as Augsburg is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Manuel Grafe awards the away team a throw-in.
Goal kick for Augsburg at WWK ARENA.
In the minute 3, Augsburg awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In Augsburg a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Mark Uth (Schalke) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 6, Free kick for Augsburg in their own half.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Robert Gumny for Augsburg who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Throw-in for Augsburg in their own half.
In the minute 9, Manuel Grafe signals a free kick to Schalke in their own half.
Free kick Augsburg.
Schalke awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 10, Robert Gumny returns to the field for Augsburg after picking up a slight injury.
Free kick for Schalke in their own half.
Mark Uth is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
In the minute 19, Mark Uth (Schalke) does not seem to be able to continue. He is replaced by Can Bozdogan.
Augsburg have a goal kick.
Augsburg awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 22, Manuel Grafe signals a Schalke throw-in in Augsburg's half.
Schalke pushes forward through Nassim Boujellab, whose finish on goal is saved.
Throw-in Schalke.
In the minute 23, Augsburg to take a throw-in in Schalke territory.
Augsburg's Daniel Caligiuri gets in a shot on goal at WWK ARENA. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Manuel Grafe signals a free kick to Schalke in their own half.
In the minute 25, Throw-in for Augsburg at WWK ARENA.
Corner awarded to Augsburg.
Manuel Grafe awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 28, Nassim Boujellab is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Schalke's Nassim Boujellab looks ok and returns to the pitch.
In the minute 32, Throw-in for Schalke at WWK ARENA.
Manuel Grafe signals a free kick to Augsburg.
Goal! Suat Serdar gives Augsburg a 1-0 lead in Augsburg.
Free kick for Schalke in the half of Augsburg.
In the minute 34, It's a goal kick for the home team in Augsburg.
Manuel Grafe signals a throw-in for Schalke, close to Augsburg's area.
Can Schalke get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Augsburg's half?
In the minute 37, Schalke have been awarded a corner by Manuel Grafe.
Throw-in Augsburg.
Ball safe as Schalke is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 39, Augsburg awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Schalke in the half of Augsburg.
In Augsburg a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 43, Free kick Schalke.
Ball goes out of play for a Schalke goal kick.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 44, Can Bozdogan for Schalke gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Manuel Grafe awards Augsburg a goal kick.
Throw-in for Schalke in the half of Augsburg.
In the minute 45, Throw-in high up the field for Schalke in Augsburg.
At WWK ARENA the fourth official shows that 15 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Schalke drives forward and Suat Serdar gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 45, At WWK ARENA, Schalke are penalized for being offside.
Schalke's Alessandro Schopf gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Augsburg have a goal kick.
In the minute 45, Manuel Grafe signals a free kick to Schalke in their own half.
Free kick for Augsburg in their own half.
Schalke awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can Augsburg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Schalke's half?
In the minute 45, Can Augsburg capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Schalke's half?
Manuel Grafe signals a free kick to Schalke in their own half.
Augsburg to take a throw-in in Schalke territory.
In the minute 45, Manuel Grafe awards Schalke a goal kick.
Schalke needs to be cautious. Augsburg have an attacking throw-in.
Goal kick for Schalke at WWK ARENA.
In the minute 45, Free kick for Augsburg in their own half.
Throw-in for Schalke in their own half.
Alessandro Schopf (Schalke) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
In the minute 45, It's a goal kick for the home team in Augsburg.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Schalke have been awarded a corner by Manuel Grafe.
In the minute 45, The first half has been concluded at WWK ARENA.
Augsburg's Florian Niederlechner has been booked in Augsburg.
In the minute 45, Salif Sane for Schalke has been booked by Manuel Grafe and receives a first yellow card.
The second half has started at WWK ARENA.
Free kick for Schalke in the half of Augsburg.
In the minute 48, Throw-in Augsburg.
Throw-in for Schalke in their own half.
Schalke's Benito Raman has run offside.
In the minute 51, Schalke awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Benito Raman gets an equalizer for Schalke. The score is now 1-1.
Schalke awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 53, At WWK ARENA, Florian Niederlechner has been booked for the second time in this match. An early shower is now waiting!
Manuel Grafe waits before resuming play because Salif Sane for Schalke is still down.
Throw-in for Augsburg at WWK ARENA.
In the minute 58, In Augsburg, Schalke push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Manuel Grafe awards the away team a throw-in.
The home team have replaced Tobias Strobl with Marco Richter. This is the first substitution made today by Heiko Herrlich.
In the minute 60, Ball safe as Augsburg is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Manuel Grafe signals a Schalke throw-in in Augsburg's half.
Salif Sane has recovered and rejoins the match in Augsburg.
In the minute 61, Schalke take a 1-2 lead thanks to Nassim Boujellab.
Suat Serdar with an assist there.
Throw-in for Augsburg in their own half.
In the minute 63, Augsburg awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Augsburg at WWK ARENA.
Manuel Grafe signals a free kick to Augsburg.
Augsburg push forward at WWK ARENA and Carlos Gruezo gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Schalke defence.
In the minute 64, Ozan Kabak (Schalke) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Manuel Grafe signals a free kick to Augsburg in their own half.
In the minute 66, Corner awarded to Augsburg.
Throw-in for Augsburg close to the penalty box.
Throw-in Schalke.
In the minute 67, Augsburg have a dangerous throw-in.
Schalke awarded a throw-in in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 69, Important block from the Augsburg defence as Benito Raman fires in a strike for Schalke.
Free kick for Augsburg in their own half.
Ball safe as Schalke is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 71, Heiko Herrlich (Augsburg) is making a second substitution, with Michael Gregoritsch replacing Carlos Gruezo.
Heiko Herrlich is making the team's third substitution at WWK ARENA with Alfred Finnbogason replacing Robert Gumny.
Manuel Grafe signals a free kick to Schalke in their own half.
In the minute 73, Manuel Grafe awards the away team a throw-in.
Augsburg's Rani Khedira breaks free at WWK ARENA. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Schalke goal kick.
In the minute 75, Throw-in for Augsburg in the half of Schalke.
Throw-in Augsburg.
Free kick for Schalke in the half of Augsburg.
In the minute 77, Rani Khedira (Augsburg) has received a yellow card from Manuel Grafe.
Schalke's Nassim Boujellab misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Augsburg at WWK ARENA.
In the minute 78, The match at WWK ARENA has been interrupted briefly for a check on Nassim Boujellab, who is down injured.
Schalkeâ€™s Nassim Boujellab is on his feet again at WWK ARENA.
In Augsburg Augsburg attack through Marco Richter. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 79, It's a goal kick for the away team in Augsburg.
Ruben Vargas for Augsburg drives towards goal at WWK ARENA. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 81, Schalke have a goal kick.
At WWK ARENA, Ralf Fahrmann has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Schalke are pushing forward but Can Bozdogan's finish is wide of the goal.
Manuel Grafe awards Augsburg a goal kick.
In the minute 82, Steven Skrzybski is replacing Benito Raman for Schalke at WWK ARENA.
Schalke to take a throw-in in Augsburg territory.
Manuel Grafe awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 84, Free kick Augsburg.
Throw-in for Schalke in their own half.
Manuel Grafe signals a Augsburg throw-in in Schalke's half.
In the minute 86, Free kick for Schalke in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Schalke goal kick.
In Augsburg a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 89, It's a goal kick for the home team in Augsburg.
Schalke awarded a free kick in their own half.
Manuel Baum is making the team's third substitution at WWK ARENA with Matija Nastasic replacing Can Bozdogan.
Schalke are whistled for offside.
Can Schalke get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Augsburg's half?
5 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Throw-in for Augsburg at WWK ARENA.
Ball safe as Augsburg is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Can Schalke get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Augsburg's half?
Marco Richter gets his shot on target but fails to score for Augsburg.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Schalke have been awarded a corner by Manuel Grafe.
Schalke's Alessandro Schopf gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Augsburg defender.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Schalke close to the penalty box.
Omar Mascarell of Schalke gets in a strike, but is off target.
Manuel Grafe awards Augsburg a goal kick.
That's full-time at WWK ARENA. The final score is 2-2.
Steven Skrzybski (Schalke) has received a yellow card from Manuel Grafe.
Goal! The home team draw level at 2-2 through a header from Marco Richter.
That's a fine assist from Michael Gregoritsch.
Reece Oxford is on a sub for Marco Richter for Augsburg.
